messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually need some help with an order I placed. I accidentally ordered a fleece jacket that I don't want. Is it possible to remove just that item from my pending order? If not, I would like to cancel the whole order. Also, I want to modify the skateboard in the order to have a maple material, 34 inch size, and a graphic design. If that modification isn't possible, then I would prefer to cancel the order altogether. Lastly, could you tell me the total price for all the grills I've bought in previous orders? My name is Ava Nguyen, and my zip code is 94128.

message.content: Hello! I actually need some help with an order I placed. I accidentally ordered a fleece jacket that I don't want. Is it possible to remove just that item from my pending order? If that modification isn't possible, then I would prefer to cancel the order altogether. Lastly, could you tell me the total price for all the grills I've bought in previous orders? My name is Ava Nguyen, and my zip code is 94128.
